author: sky.cactus
content:
Why do these two pages not match?
<https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1.md#linking-to-other-eips>
> you would link to this EIP with [EIP-1](./eip-1.md).
<https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1#linking-to-other-eips>
> you would link to this EIP with [EIP-1](/EIPS/eip-1).

author: sky.cactus
content: Maybe something about the renderer is doing a find and replace, which is catching that link and rewriting it?
